baseline_texts: The image shows a person folding a red and white checkered long-sleeve shirt on a tiled floor. The person is wearing a striped long-sleeve top with a watch on their left wrist. The shirt is being folded neatly, with one hand holding the collar area and the other adjusting the sleeve. The shirt appears to be in the process of being folded, with one sleeve already folded inward.

The image shows hands holding and displaying a piece of red and white checkered fabric, possibly a shirt. The fabric is neatly folded, and the person appears to be demonstrating or arranging it on a patterned floor surface. The person is wearing a striped shirt and a watch.

Their hands are in the process of folding the shirt neatly. The shirt appears to have long sleeves with a solid pink contrasting inner side of the cuff.

The focus is on the shirt and the hands, with no other objects clearly visible.

A person's hands are visible, working on the shorts, possibly sewing or performing some kind of tailoring or mending work. The person appears to have dark skin and is wearing a watch on their left wrist.

The image shows a close-up of a person's hands folding a red and white checkered cloth or shirt on a mosaic-style stone floor. The person is wearing a striped long-sleeve shirt and a wristwatch on their left wrist. The hands are in the process of neatly folding the fabric.

In this frame, a person is folding a red and white checkered shirt on a tiled floor. The hands are visible, with one wearing a watch and a striped shirt sleeve, carefully folding the shirt. The person's fingers are positioned to align the fabric neatly. The tiles on the floor are a mix of dark and light shades with irregular shapes.
